mapper.update:
update student
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_uuid = #{userUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stu_name = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
college = #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_sch_year = #{inSchYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stu_class = #{stuClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where stu_num = #{stuNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update student set uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_uuid = #{userUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_name = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, college = #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_sch_year = #{inSchYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_class = #{stuClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where stu_num = #{stuNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}
